title: The Zeitgeist Movement - Activist Orientation Guide
description:
This torrent is of The Zeitgeist Movement's Orientation Guide which was released to the public on February 25, 2009 by Peter Joseph. Before reading this guide, please watch Zeitgeist and Zeitgeist Addendum (go to my other torrent, Zeitgeist 2009 Pack to download these) for a better understanding of the topics discussed. Also, please watch these videos and read this guide with an open-mind, leave behind your current beliefs and opinions on our economic, political and social systems. 

I have released a new torrent which includes Zeitgeist and Zeitgeist Addendum with several subtitle files, the Activist Orientation Guide and the DVD slide-presentation of the guide featuring Peter Joseph, as well as Jacque Fresco and Roxanne Meadows' Venus Project booklet and video. Please click on my username, OilersFan05, and download the Zeitgeist 2009 Pack.

Finally, it is extremely encouraged that you spread these files to your friends, family, colleagues and the public. The more that are aware of this movement, the better it'll be. None of these files are meant for profit, either by myself or Peter Joseph. It is to create public awareness and to build a mass movement to which we can rebuild society where government control and monetary systems are non-existent.
